description:
Blend the spicy, energizing heat of chai with the smooth richness of 100% Arabica coffee, and you have a drink so good you may find yourself enjoying it in the great indoors too.

  • Dissolves easily in hot or cold water
  • 100% Arabica beans from high altitude farms in Columbia
  • 5 individual servings per box
  • For best results empty the Alpine start pouch into your cup before adding your hot water, that way you won’t lose any coffee to steam
  • Ingredients: Evaporated cane juice, organic soy milk powder, instant dark fine tea, spices and Arabica instant coffee
  • Allergen: contains soy
name: Alpine Start Dirty Chai Latte
